text: Zeta, Vaseraga, Sergeant Ilsa, and new recruit Lester chase after a lackey of the Foe. The lackey's weapon turns into a hostile automagod bearing the name Arianensa, and Lester dies in its ambush, causing Vaseraga to snap.
trans: 泽塔、巴萨拉卡、伊尔莎中士和新人莱斯特正在追捕一名『敌』组织的走狗。那名走狗的武器变成了一个被称为阿利亚内萨的机神，莱斯特因它的突然攻击而殉职，巴萨拉卡也因此陷入了暴走。

name: Man/男子
text: Huff... Huff...
trans: 呼…呼…

text: On the outskirts of town, the ragged breaths of a man on the run echo through a tunnel. Pounding footsteps, four sets in total, aren't far behind him.
trans: 在城郊外一个旧坑道里，回荡着一个正在逃亡的人发出的刺耳喘息声。四组急促的脚步声紧跟其后。

name: Zeta/泽塔
text: I think he ran in here.
trans: 我想他跑进这里了。

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Yes. We've got him cornered.
trans: 啊，这样我们就把它逼进绝路了。

text: His pursuers are members of the Society, dispatched to liberate a town suffering from mayhem wrought by the Foe.
trans: 男子的追捕者是几位“组织”的成员，他们旨在解救因遭『敌』破坏而陷入混乱的区域。

name: Ilsa/伊尔莎
text: This tunnel is a dead end. Zeta and Vaseraga will take point while me and Kid Clueless here provide cover.
trans: 这条隧道是个死胡同。泽塔和巴萨拉卡为前锋，我和这边的“瞎忙活”做掩护。

name: Young Man/青年
text: Ma'am! Providing cover, ma'am! Commander Ilsa, ma'am!
trans: 是！收到，长官！伊尔莎指挥官大人！

name: Zeta/泽塔
text: You're Lester, right? I don't think I need to tell you that your job is to keep the enemy from sneaking up on us.
trans: 你叫莱斯特，是吧？我想你应该了解，你的任务是别让敌人来偷袭我们。

name: Lester/莱斯特
text: Yes, ma'am! Understood, Officer Zeta
trans: 是！了解！泽塔前辈！

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Stay your enthusiasm. Remain calm while you perform your duties.
trans: 别太激动。行动的时候保持冷静。

name: Lester/莱斯特
text: Thank you for the advice, sir! Vaseraga, sir!
trans: 十分感谢！巴萨拉卡先生！

name: Lester/莱斯特
text: If I perform well on this mission, I might finally be able to become a weapon contractor.
trans: 如果在这次行动中表现出色的话，我终于有可能成为一名武器的契约者了。

name: Ilsa/伊尔莎
text: Hah! The only thing you've earned is your nickname: Kid Clueless. I've seen more disciplined faces at a dog show. Like hell you'd get a custom weapon.
trans: 呵…！所以你才老会让人说“瞎忙活”。怎么可能把武器交给一个临敌松懈的家伙啊？

name: Lester/莱斯特
text: I... spoke out of turn, Commander Ilsa.
trans: 是！…对，对不起，伊尔莎指挥官大人。

name: Ilsa/伊尔莎
text: One word from me and I'll send you back to basic. If you want my good graces, then put up or shut up. I don't care if all your limbs go flying off, keep your head in the operation.
trans: 我的几句评价就让你心虚了吗。想要得到我的赞许，就拿出决心来。要做好即使手忙脚乱也绝不放弃任务的觉悟。

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Then let's follow your advice and capture the enemy. Move.
trans: 要庆祝胜利还是等捉到敌人再说吧。走了。

text: The squad led by Ilsa heads farther into the tunnel.
trans: 随后伊尔莎带着一行人往坑道深处走去。

text: Soon they see the flicker of a torch peaking out of the darkness.
trans: 不久后，黑暗中出现了火把的亮光。

name: Lester/莱斯特
text: There!
trans: 那里！

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Looks like he's armed. I'll deal with the weapon while you take him into custody.
trans: 看起来全副武装啊。我来夺缴武器，之后再由你来抓捕他。

name: Ilsa/伊尔莎
text: Lester! Back up! Idiots who run to the front line don't get chosen to be weapon contractors!
trans: 莱斯特！别以为一个往敌人枪口上撞的半吊子能被选中为武器的契约者！

name: Lester/莱斯特
text: Sorry, ma'am!
trans: 是！

name: Ilsa/伊尔莎
text: Take him alive! Don't take the easy way out by killing him!
trans: 全员，活捉敌人！可别轻易让他死掉了！

name: The Three/三人
text: Roger!
trans: 了解！

name: Man/男子
text: Automagod Arianensa dwells in my weapon.
trans: 你，寄宿在我武器中的机神阿利亚内萨啊…

name: Man/男子
text: You will come to know its power!
trans: 现在，展现出你的力量吧！

name: Zeta/泽塔
text: Was that gun actually—
trans: 那把枪难道是…！？

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: The same as our weapons？
trans: 和我们的武器一样…？

name: Ilsa/伊尔莎
text: So he's a contractor too. Now I get why they made a sealer like me tag along.
trans: 他也是契约者吗。那么，身为封印者的我，被命令和你们同行，就说的通了。

name: Man's Voice/男子的声音
text: Gyaaaah!
trans: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！！

text: The cornered man continues to scream, oblivious to the baffled eyes upon him.
trans: 那男人持续发出惨叫，留泽塔一行人在旁边露出惊讶的表情。

name: Ilsa/伊尔莎
text: The weapon is devouring the wielder？
trans: 武器在吞噬使用者？

name: Lester/莱斯特
text: It's changing shape! There's some kind of light building up around it...
trans: 武器的形状在改变！有种光芒在它周围聚集…

text: Antfirsnotamor pectomel.
Ihnulcang cattka.

name: Lester/莱斯特
text: What's it doi—
trans: 那…那是什么机关…

name: Lester/莱斯特
trans: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Lester!
trans: 莱斯特！

name: Zeta/泽塔
text: The weapon turned into a machine？ What the hell？
trans: 武器变成了机器…！那是什么东西！

name: Ilsa/伊尔莎
text: Keep your fool mouth shut! We can chat about whatever the enemy is later!
trans: 把你们的嘴闭上！我们还不知道敌人的情况！

name: Ilsa/伊尔莎
text: Armor Chicken! Break the rock supports and collapse the overhang—
trans: 铁鸡！随便打些岩石下来！用来做掩体——

text: The commands of Ilsa go unheard as Vaseraga approaches the unknown enemy.
trans: 巴萨拉卡完全没有听从伊尔莎的指令，径直走向未知的敌人。

text: Atgert curdeqai.

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Ngh...

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Aaaaah!
trans: 唔哦啊啊啊啊啊！！！

name: Zeta/泽塔
text: It's happening again!
trans: 那家伙，又……？

text: Vaseraga, completely overwhelmed by Grynoth's power, crosses arms with the mysterious automaton.
trans: 突然出现的神秘机械和再次被格罗诺斯力量所吞噬的巴萨拉卡。

text: Zeta can only stand before the might of these two approaching storms.
trans: 面对两方风暴般的对决，泽塔显得束手无策。
